turn.0: Why should I be vaccinated? Specifically a flu shot.
turn.2: Thanks for clarifying this. I've never had the flu.
turn.3: Good in you :)  Please get vaccinated for everything that is available. It helps protect your community.
turn.4: To be honest all I hear about is flu vaccines. What else is available?
turn.5: Measles, chicken pox and a whole range of other diseases.  Ask your doctor, they will gladly give you an overview.
turn.6: Do most people have a doctor? Because I don't, I haven't seen a doctor in years outside of an ER and that was for injuries.
turn.7: Depends on where you come from. In Germany you have a general practitioner that is "your doctor". It gets documented with your health insurance.  In Norway you get a doctor assigned and are not allowed to go to a different one, except for emergencies (afaik).
